product_name: CetaphilDaily Facial Cleanser Face Wash Fragrance Free for Sensitive Skin
summary: SummaryCetaphil Daily Facial Cleanser Face Wash is specially developed as a gentle gel to foam formula that deep cleans and minimizes the appearance of pores without stripping skin of natural moisture.
details: DetailsBenefitsDesigned with a dermatologist-backed blend of niacinamide (vitamin B3), panthenol (vitamin B5) and hydrating glycerin to improve the resilience of sensitive skinClinically proven to deep clean while effectively removing dirt, excess oils and makeup without leaving skin dry or tightClinically proven to remove 94% of impuritiesDermatologist tested and specifically formulated for sensitive skinDefends against 5 signs of skin sensitivity including dryness, irritation, roughness, tightness and a weakened skin barrierKey IngredientsNiacinamide (vitamin B3) - Helps reduce inflammation, lines, wrinkles and pigmentation. It also helps with skin pore appearance and oil regulation in the skinPanthenol (vitamin B5) - Helps to maintain a healthy skin barrierGlycerin - Primarily hydrating and moisturizing the skin, improving the skin barrier, and promoting overall skin healthFormulated WithoutFragranceParabensHypoallergenicItem 2619863How To UseMassage a small amount onto wet skin. Rinse.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Pantolactone, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Massage a small amount onto wet skin. Rinse.

reviews.headline: Yes I would buy this product again and again.
Cleans without drying
reviews.comments: A beauty influencer recommended this cleasnser claiming it was similar to a high end brand gel cleanser. She was right. This cleanses without making you face feel tight.  Try it.

reviews.headline: Have used this product for years
reviews.comments: I like this product.  I have used it for many years.  I tried another brands, but I like the Cetaphil Daily Facial Cleanser, so much better.

reviews.headline: Would not recommend
reviews.comments: I bought this thinking it was a great option for my combination, sensitive skin. The only thing i changed in my skincare routine was my cleanser, and after about 2 weeks i had to stop using this product. It left my skin burning and peeling like I've never had before. I also had random pimples popping up in areas that i dont usually have acne. Very disappointing..

faceoff_positive.comments:
Influenster kindly sent me this Cetaphil Daily Face Cleaner. What is not to love about it? It cleanses combination to oily & sensitive skin. I can attest to this. My face is combo & my son's is sensitive. We both have used this & it doesn't irritate or dry us out. This one is Frangrance Free! It has hydrating glycerin along with essential vitamins B5 & B3. This reinforces the skin's moisture barrier, balances skin & removes dirt, excess oils & makeup without leaving skin dry or tight. 

Please note I am not a dermatologist or esthetician. This review is based solely on my experience with the product. 

#ThatsFresh #Cetaphil #contest #complimentary @CetaphilUS @Influenster #cleanskin #youngskincare #matureskin #matureskincare #matureskinofinstagram #fragrancefreeskincare #fragrancefree
faceoff_positive.headline: Bomb cleanser!

faceoff_negative.comments: Please bring back the prior formula. The new formula smells terrible â€” like chemicals.  And I don't think the the new version works as well.  I loved the prior formula and used it for years.
faceoff_negative.headline: The New Formula is Terrible
